Saipem Nigeria bụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka Naijiria nke Saipem, nke nwere nnukwu ihe owuwu na-ekpuchi ụdị ọrụ niile maka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas dịka Drilling On / Offshore, ọrụ owuwu na / offshore (pipelines, ụlọ ọrụ ike, ọrụ mmepụta) Injinia, Nlekọta.
EPIC/EPC Contractor nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos na New operational Base na Port Harcourt (Rumulumeni mpaghara).
A na-ekpe Saipem ikpe na Italy maka ebubo iri ngarị na Naịjirịa.
